IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM 2021/KER/704

WEDNESDAY, THE O6TH DAY OF JANUARY 2021 / 16TH POUSHA, 1942

THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON
06.01.2021, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING:

Crme 221/2015 > 2021/KER/704
V.G.ARUN, J.
- GrLM.C.No.221 of 2015.
Dated this the 6" day of January, 2021
ORDER

Being a Crl.M.C of the year 2015, pertaining to a crime of 2014,
a report was called for, from the jurisdictional Magistrate Court. It is
reported that pending the Crl.MC, the investigation of the crime was
completed, final report filed and cognizance taken as C.C.No.2414 of
2015 by JFCM-II, Kollam. It is reported that the case was notified on
30.12.2019 and summons ordered to the accused on 20.10.2020. The
case now stands posted to 22.12.2020 awaiting return of summons.
The Crl.M.C having been filed challenging registration of FIR and
further proceedings in Crime No.767 0 2019 of Kollam East Police
Station, nothing survives for consideration in the Crl.M.C, due to the
subsequent events mentioned above. Hence the Crl.M.C is dismissed,
without prejudice to the petitioner's right to agitate and raise all
contentions before the jurisdictional court.

Sd/-
V.G.ARUN
JUDGE
